subject: Need help on running junit from ant
msgSnippet: Hi, I catch java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Network when I run junit task from ant. It happens only when I pass jvm arguments for debugging:
messageBody:
Hi,
I catch java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Network when I run junit task
from ant.
It happens only when I pass jvm arguments for debugging:
<junit failureproperty="test.failed" printsummary="true" fork="yes">
<jvmarg value="-Xdebug"/>
<jvmarg value="-Xrunjdwp:transport=dt_socket,address...
If no jvm arguments defined everything works fine.

Thanks!

Below is the log of the exception:
